abilities.name: Harmonic Unstring
abilities.description: You are able to choose one creature within 60ft that you can see. The targeted creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature gains Harmonic Unstring, which lasts until the end of your next turn. The creature's next attack will have disadvantage while having Harmonic Unstring.

abilities.name: Melody of Restoration
abilities.description: You choose one creature that you can see within 60ft of you, and heal them for d4s equal to your Proficiency Bonus. You can use this ability a number of times equal to your combat value per long rest.

abilities.name: Combat Redeployment
abilities.description: After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be Advanced Forward by 30%.

abilities.name: The Belobog March
abilities.description: Increases the ATK of all allies by 55%, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to 16% of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus 20% for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Leading the Way
abilities.description: When Bronya is on the field, all allies deal 10% more DMG.

abilities.name: Banner of Command
abilities.description: After using Bronya's Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies' ATK increases by 15% for 2 turns.
